snippet: The City of Detroit expects to file a plan to adjust its debts by year’s end, a lawyer said Friday during a bankruptcy hearing.
abstract: Lawyer says during bankruptcy hearing that City of Detroit expects to file a plan to adjust its debts by 2013’s end.
lead_paragraph: The City of Detroit expects to file a plan to adjust its debts by year’s end, a lawyer said Friday during a bankruptcy hearing.

headline.main: Michigan: Another Hearing on the Detroit Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Another Hearing On the Detroit Bankruptcy
